governance.chain: L0 Human → L1 LDS Kernel V1 → L2 Proposer

core.name: SAINT White Label
core.description: White-label branding engine for PROJECT SAINT. Enables Saint-Gobain to deploy branded instances for different business units, partners, or enterprise clients. Theme configuration, logo/color/domain swapping, brand preview, and client branding management. No code changes required — branding via config entity swap.
core.principle: Brand swapping changes what users SEE, never what the kernel DOES. Kernel behavior, invariant enforcement, and audit logging are NOT overridable. Only visual elements are white-label targets.

dependencies.kernel: SAINT_KERNEL.lds.json — kernel behavior is non-overridable by white-label config
dependencies.boundaries: SAINT_BOUNDARIES.lds.json — only gcp_admin can manage branding
dependencies.shell: SAINT_SHELL.lds.json — shell theming system consumes white-label config
dependencies.auth: SAINT_AUTH.lds.json — login screen branding panel uses white-label config

branding_configuration.description: Complete set of configurable brand elements. Each brand config is a self-contained entity that replaces the default ValidKernel theme.

elements.description: Application name shown in header, browser title, emails
Subtitle shown on login screen and about page
Primary logo — used in sidebar header and login screen
Icon-only logo — used in collapsed sidebar and favicon
Logo used in email templates (PNG required for email compatibility)
Background image for login screen branding panel (optional)
Primary accent color — buttons, links, active states
Secondary accent — success states, positive indicators
App background gradient or solid color
Custom domain for this brand instance

non_overridable.reason: Kernel validation logic is invariant — cannot be altered by branding
All 8 invariants enforced regardless of brand
Audit trail active for all brand instances
Boundary definitions are immutable — branding cannot add/remove permissions
Tenant isolation enforced regardless of brand

brand_management.description: Admin interface for managing brand configurations

operations.description: Create a new brand configuration with custom identity, colors, and domain
operations.workflow: Fill brand config form → preview → save → activate

operations.description: Preview how the app looks with a brand configuration before activating
features: Preview all key screens (login, dashboard, sidebar)

operations.description: Set a brand configuration as active for a domain or tenant
Clone an existing brand configuration as a starting point for a new brand
Export brand configuration as JSON for backup or transfer
operations.format: JSON file with all brand config values and asset URLs

multi_tenant_branding.description: How white-label branding works in a multi-tenant deployment

routing.flow: Request arrives → resolve domain → load brand config → apply theme → render app

isolation.data: Brand config is visual only — data isolation is per-tenant, not per-brand
isolation.kernel: Same kernel validates all tenants regardless of brand
isolation.audit: Audit logs include brand/tenant context for traceability

preset_themes.description: Pre-built brand themes that can be used as-is or as starting points

themes.description: GCP green branding with professional styling

themes.name: Light Professional
themes.description: Clean light theme for enterprise deployments

brand_config.name: string — brand name
brand_config.domain: string — custom domain for this brand
brand_config.identity: object — app_name, tagline, logo URLs, favicon

demo_data.description: Synthetic brand configurations for demo mode.

react_component.description: Brand management interface. Brand config editor with live preview. Theme preset selector. Asset uploader. Side-by-side brand comparison. Domain configuration. All admin-only.
exports: SAINTWhiteLabel — main entity component (brand management + routing)
BrandList — list of configured brands with status
BrandEditor — full brand configuration form with all overridable elements
BrandPreview — live preview of brand applied to key screens
ThemePresetSelector — grid of preset themes with one-click application
AssetUploader — logo and image upload with crop/resize
DomainConfig — custom domain configuration and DNS verification

views.gcp_admin: Full access — create, edit, preview, activate, clone, export brands
views.gcp_engineer: No access — kernel DENIES load_entity for this role
views.sales_rep: No access — kernel DENIES load_entity for this role
views.contractor: No access — kernel DENIES load_entity for this role

react_component.code_reference: Follows TradeOS entity pattern. Brand configs stored as data, consumed by SAINTShell theme system at runtime. No code changes for brand swaps.
